Survivor:ImprovisedWeapon.NAME: Improvised Weapon
Survivor:ImprovisedWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exert [E] : Deal !XD! damage, instead; Exhaust.

Survivor:Scavenge.NAME: Improvise
Survivor:Scavenge.DESCRIPTION: Add one of three random Improvised cards to your hand.

Survivor:ImprovisedShield.NAME: Improvised Shield
Survivor:ImprovisedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exert [E] : Gain !XB! block, instead; Exhaust.
